article_title: Another Perspective: New Mexico has a ‘Dr. Holly Abernathy’ problem

article_metadata.description: In 2014, The Wall Street Journal explored the ways that Obamacare’s expansion of Medicaid was “straining some health-care systems that already don’t have enough doctors and staff” and challenging “medical practices’ bottom lines in ways that lead them to turn some away.”
